verses.text: Hear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* God, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* voice \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* lament: guard \w my|strong="H1732"\w* life from \w the|strong="H1732"\w* dread \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* foe.

Hide \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* villains \w who|strong="H2416"\w* secretly plot, \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* blustering throng \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6963"\w* evil,
\w who|strong="H7489"\w* \w have|strong="H7489"\w* sharpened \w their|strong="H5641"\w* tongue like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H6466"\w* aimed bitter words like arrows,
\w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w from|strong="H1697"\w* ambush \w they|strong="H1697"\w* launch at \w the|strong="H1697"\w* blameless, shooting swiftly \w and|strong="H2719"\w* unafraid.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* strengthen \w their|strong="H3808"\w* wicked purpose, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* tell \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* snares \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* hidden, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* say \w to|strong="H3372"\w* themselves, ‘\w Who|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* see?’

\w They|strong="H1697"\w* \w think|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w crimes|strong="H7451"\w* full cunningly \w hidden|strong="H2934"\w* \w deep|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* crafty hearts.

\w But|strong="H3820"\w* \w God|strong="H2664"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* arrow \w will|strong="H3820"\w* shoot \w them|strong="H7130"\w*, swiftly \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* smitten.

\w For|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* tongue \w he|strong="H3384"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* ruin, all \w will|strong="H1961"\w* shudder \w with|strong="H1961"\w* horror \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sight \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7200"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w person|strong="H7200"\w*, touched \w to|strong="H5921"\w* awe, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* ponder \w what|strong="H7200"\w* God \w has|strong="H3605"\w* wrought, \w will|strong="H3956"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tale \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* deeds.

\w In|strong="H7919"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous rejoice, \w in|strong="H7919"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* take refuge; \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* true-hearted \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* glory.
